Bases: object

ARGUMENTS = {'chunksize': ArgTuple(short='-c', long='--chunksize', help_='The chunksize to read from the data in rows', required=False, type_=<class 'int'>, default=500000), 'input_dir': ArgTuple(short='-i', long='--input_dir', help_='path to input directory of zip files', required=True, type_=<class 'pathlib.Path'>, default=None), 'model': ArgTuple(short='-m', long='--model', help_='the model number', required=False, type_=<class 'int'>, default=1), 'output_dir': ArgTuple(short='-o', long='--output_dir', help_='path to out directory for the datastores', required=True, type_=<class 'pathlib.Path'>, default=None), 'passenger_type': ArgTuple(short='-t', long='--passenger_type', help_='the type of passenger to analyse', required=False, type_=<class 'str'>, default=None), 'products': ArgTuple(short='-p', long='--products', help_='path to input pendler products csv files', required=True, type_=<class 'pathlib.Path'>, default=None), 'rabattrin': ArgTuple(short='-r', long='--rabattrin', help_='the rabattrin to use', required=False, type_=<class 'int'>, default=None), 'year': ArgTuple(short='-y', long='--year', help_='year to analyse', required=True, type_=<class 'int'>, default=None), 'zones': ArgTuple(short='-z', long='--zones', help_='path to input zones csv files', required=True, type_=<class 'pathlib.Path'>, default=None)}¶

tablesalt.preprocessing.tools.find_datastores(start_dir: Optional[str] = None) → str¶

Find the location of the processed rejsekort datastores

The directory to start searching from . The default is None.

FileNotFoundError

If no rejsekort datastores can be found.

str

The directory of the rejsekort datastores.
